about_the_game:
Wordatro! is a simple and easy-to-learn roguelite, designed by an independent developer. This demo puts your language skills and strategy to the test by offering a pool of letters to form words. Each letter has a point value, and the length of the words you create affects a score multiplier, encouraging you to optimize every move.

As you accumulate points and reach specific milestones, you’ll unlock one of the 25 bonuses available in the demo, as well as letter modifiers that bring variety and depth to every playthrough. Whether you’re a fan of word games or roguelites, Wordatro! delivers a rich and engaging challenge.

The replayability of the Wordatro! demo is high, thanks to the many strategies you can explore to achieve victory. Every game offers new combinations of bonuses, inspiring you to try different approaches to conquer the demo’s 7 levels. With an intuitive interface and easy-to-pick-up gameplay, Wordatro! is suitable for everyone, while offering enough depth to captivate even the most experienced and strategic players.

Created with passion, Wordatro! is an immersive adventure that combines simplicity and strategy. Take on the challenge and test your linguistic skills! Can you conquer the levels in the demo and claim victory in Wordatro!?
